metadata.title: CVE-2016-10539 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: negotiator is an HTTP content negotiator for Node.js and is used by many modules and frameworks including Express and Koa. The header for "Accept-Language", when parsed by negotiator 0.6.0 and earlier is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service via a specially crafted string.

criterions.comment: node-negotiator package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-1').
